Token.Abstract: Set the label's text to the given string, using the given kerning value if able. (i.e., if running on iOS 6.0+).

Parameter.Name: text
Parameter.Abstract: The text string to set the label to display

Parameter.Name: kerning
Parameter.Abstract: The number of points by which to adjust spacing between characters (positive values increase spacing, negative values decrease spacing, a value of 0 is default)

Token.Abstract: Set the kerning value of the currently-set text.

Parameter.Name: kerning
Parameter.Abstract: The number of points by which to adjust spacing between characters (positive values increase spacing, negative values decrease spacing, a value of 0 is default)
